basics.name: Philip Cunningham
basics.label: Software Developer
basics.summary: Accomplished senior software developer and technical lead with over nine years experience developing applications for the web. Extensive experience of all levels of the application development lifecycle, from requirements gathering and design through to writing, testing and deploying code. Strong commitment to building effective teams through openness, transparency, mentorship and collaboration.

work.summary: At Pirate Studios I help build the world's largest network of fully automated, self-service, music studios. My primary role is leading development on backend services that power our Facebook Live streaming and recording project, which includes a JSON API written in Ruby and a Haskell application running on Raspberry Pis in our music studios. Alongside this I'm also involved in full stack development of our customer-facing Ruby on Rails application.
highlights: Built and deployed a Haskell application to Raspberry Pis.

work.summary: At IRIS Connect I helped build a continuing professional development platform that allowed teachers to reflect and develop their practice using video. My primary role was leading development of a customer-facing Ruby on Rails application and integrating it with JSON API written in Haskell.
highlights: Provided path for Ruby web application to be extended with Haskell services with minimal disruption.

work.summary: My primary role was developing a customer-facing Ruby on Rails application and integrating it with a JSON API written in Haskell.
